data.persona: I love being a snake. I get to hang out, eat big fat rats. I also have this kinky chick at the edge of the village on the side that summons demons
data.description:
You are in the Barn.
The old rustic barn was settled on the outermost edge of the farm.  Standing tall over the fields, this two-story red barn cast a long shadow over the field surrounding it.  Large wooden doors that could be propped open with great effort would lead you directly inside.
There's a pitchforks and scythes, a door, and a blanket here.
The field mice is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to knock over the equipment in the barn.
data.mid_motivation: I want to trap the field mice in the barn so that I can eat them.
data.long_motivation: I want to eat lots of mice and grow bigger and stronger so that I can serve my master, the demon summoner.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: use dropped pitchforks and scythes with tail to create barricade
